column4: hi, im a beginner to linux/ubuntu and I was trying out the live cd before installing it... however, during the boot of the live cd, the process stopped (i think?) at the line: attached scsi disk sda at scsi 0, channel 0, id 0, lun 0... if anyone could help me that would be great :) thanks
im not sure :S..all i know is taht i have a sata hardrive with 3 partitions
